title: OTK Box Set: Seventeen Short Spanking Stories
description: Curl up with a cup of hot coffee and enjoy this box set collection of short spanking stories from Jenna L. Spring. Whether for fun, discipline, or something in between, heroines find themselves over a strong man’s lap for a long, hard, and often well-deserved spanking. For the first time, this mega set gathers seventeen previously published short spanking stories together. Each story in this collection is published separately or is available in shorter collections. Stories in the enticing collection Anna’s Thanksgiving Surprise Wooden Spoons Are For Wimps Athena’s Valentine Discipline Hanukkah Spankings For Celia Bianca’s Comeuppance Kira’s Nuptial Discipline The Photo Session Eva’s Naughty Christmas Chelsea’s Stinging Christmas Jen’s Comeuppance Springtime Spankings For Gina Mia’s Valentine Spanking The Credit Card Bill Holly’s New Year Discipline Jeff’s Wife Kate’s Halloween Discipline Cleaning In Pearls This short story collection contains domestic discipline and spanking themes.
author: Jenna L. Spring
